name: degen-financial-plugins
description: Degen crypto plugins for Claude — bonding curves, wallet forensics, meme coin DD, pump.fun launches, and on-chain portfolio tracking. Forked from anthropics/financial-services-plugins.

plugins.name: crypto-analysis
plugins.description: Core degen analysis — install first. DexScreener, Helius, Jupiter, pump.fun, Birdeye connectors. Degen DD, bonding curves, wallet forensics, rug checks.

plugins.name: meme-coin-research
plugins.description: Meme coin launch analysis, CT scoring, and narrative engineering.

plugins.name: pump-launch
plugins.description: pump.fun launch playbook, bundle strategy, graduation path planning.

plugins.name: wallet-forensics
plugins.description: Deep whale tracking, sniper detection, and fund tracing on Solana.

plugins.name: defi-portfolio
plugins.description: DeFi portfolio PnL tracking and position management.
